type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

external_links_in_new_tab.label: Open external link in new tab

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

age_verification_popup_redirect_link.label: Redirect to a link from the store

enable_recently_viewed_products.label: Enable
enable_recently_viewed_products.info: Theme save viewed products to cookies. Add the 'Recently viewed product' section to display the products.

recently_viewed_products_limit.label: Size
recently_viewed_products_limit.info: Maximum number of product to save in the recently viewed list.

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

terms_and_condition_checkbox.label: Enable the accept terms checkbox
terms_and_condition_checkbox.info: Works with the checkout button. You can find the text in the language editor under the "General" tab.

continue_shopping_link.label: Continue shopping link
continue_shopping_link.info: Set the link for the continue shopping button for both cart states. The empty and non-empty cart.

swatches_design.label: Swatch mode
swatches_design.info: Select the swatches mode. If you pick the image or color mode but see the text value, you should check if product variant has an image. Or if the 'Colors configuration' field has the configuration for this value.

variants_names.label: Option name(s)
variants_names.info: Set the option name to apply color swatches configuration. You may set multiple options with a coma-separate list (example: color,colour,choose color). Please note, that color swatches may be applied only to one product option.

css_colors.label: Colors configuration
css_colors.info:
Set comma-separated list of colors. Split items with ',' sign. Each item should be a pair of color text and color HEX code separated by ':' sign, like colorText:colorHEXcode. In my example I showed the configuration for three colors, you may set as many as you need.
 Example:
 black:#000000,white:#FFFFFF,blue:#2196F3 Please note, that this field is very sensitive to the syntax, one missing coma or semicolon may cause an error.

heading_aligment.label: Heading alignment
heading_aligment.info: Works with link button and swipe buttons on mobile devices

bottom_spacing.label: Add bottom spacing for mobile
bottom_spacing.info: The bottom spacing may collapse with the top spacing of the next section. Use it, only if your next section's top spacing is set to none.

width.label: Width
width.info: The Wide option works for screens with 1440px width and more.

show_all_text_in_admin.label: Open all tabs
show_all_text_in_admin.info: This option works only in the admin panel for better content editing. Animations don't work

call_to_action.label: Banner mode
call_to_action.info: One link banner. All banner content is a link, including an image, texts, and a primary button. The button is optional.

paragraph_1.content: In buttons mode, you may configure one or two buttons.

paragraph_2.content: No action. Use this mode for banners without links. Just to show image and text.

url.label: Link
url.info: Use for "One link banner" or "Buttons" modes

desktop_image_height.label: Desktop fixed height
desktop_image_height.info: This option applies only for desktop screens (width > 992px) and the previous height option is set to Fixed.

call_to_action.label: Banner mode
call_to_action.info: One link banner. All banner content is a link, including an image, texts, and a primary button. The button is optional.

paragraph_1.content: In buttons mode, you may configure one or two buttons.

paragraph_2.content: No action. Use this mode for banners without links. Just to show image and text.

url.label: Link
url.info: Use for "One link banner" or "Buttons" modes

autoplay_time.label: Change slides every
autoplay_time.info: It doesn't work in the theme editor. Once done with slide configuration, you may manually switch to the next slide using arrows or dots.

video_slide_mode.label: Video slide mode
video_slide_mode.info: Due to browser policy, "Autoplay with sound" mode will work after the first user activity.

option__4.label: Play on click with muted sound

play_button_enabled.label: Show play button for the video

option__4.label: Play on click with muted sound

play_button_enabled.label: Show play button for the video

link_name.label: Link name
link_name.info: Show link to all blog posts

heading_aligment.info: Works with button. Works with swipe buttons on mobile devices

button_name.label: Button name
button_name.info: Button to all products from current collection. Works if collection has more products than shown

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app.

paragraph.content: This section is only to display the recently viewed product. To collect the product list enable it at 'Theme settings -> Recently viewed products'

heading_aligment.info: Works with swipe buttons on mobile devices

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers

api_key.label: Google Maps API key
api_key.info: You’ll need to [register a Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) to display the map

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: Google Maps will find the exact location

heading_aligment.info: Works with swipe buttons on mobile devices
Works with button. Works with swipe buttons on mobile devices
Works with button. Works with swipe buttons on mobile devices

url.label: Link
url.info: Leave empty if you will add a link in a text field below

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

header_layout.label: Desktop menu type
header_layout.info: Menu type is automatically optimized for mobile.

enable_sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header
enable_sticky_header.info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll up.

icons_color.label: Icons
icons_color.info: Works with desktop and mobile menu icons

logo_svg.label: Svg code
logo_svg.info: Use instead of an image. SVG should have width and height attributes.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

badge_items.label: Menu items names
badge_items.info: Write a list of menu items separated by commas

header__country.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header__language.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header_social.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

enable_sticky_filter_button.label: Enable sticky filter button for mobile

media_size.label: Desktop media size
media_size.info: Media is automatically optimized for mobile.

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

header.content: Info popup next to option name

paragraph.content: Type option name to link content. You may set text, dynamic source, or page.

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/os20/themes-by-shopify/dawn/page-types#product-rating-block)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

paragraph.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

paragraph__1.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/themes/development/recommended-products)

paragraph_1.content: Thank you for using the Minion theme. It includes numerous options and features that fit any industry and business size. At the same time, theme options are flexible, self-explained, and easy to use. Set the empty value at theme settings if you want to remove some text, button, or another element.

paragraph_2.content: If you want to change the text of any button, checkbox, etc, go to Theme actions -> Edit languages.

paragraph_3.content: Be sure you are familiar with the Shopify theme editor. Sections and blocks, templates, theme settings, if it sounds weird to you please check the [theme structure](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure) Shopify help page.

paragraph.content: Add a description by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)
Add image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)
